# MobileSAM Mirror (mobilesam-mirror)

This repository packages the upstream MobileSAM project for PyPI so it can be
installed as a standard dependency.

Upstream source:
- https://github.com/ChaoningZhang/MobileSAM

Notes:
- This mirror does not bundle any checkpoint weights.
- Download weights from the upstream repository as needed.

License:
- Apache-2.0 (see LICENSE).
